reviews.review:
The game it self could be such a good game.
Counter Strike was allways my game to play. I've played css and 1.6 too.

The Pro's :
A great way to learn swarwords in multiple languages.
I've met alot of very nice people over this game, some even being very close friends till this date.
I've learned to play as a team, and that team ecconomy realy does matter.

Cons:
Cheaters, cheaters every where.

Back in the day you where like:
-"Damn he hit's some nasty shots, he must be good at the game!"
Present:
-"Damn he hits some nice shots, he is most likely cheating!"

The Anti-Cheat is a joke and doesn't rly work.
You've need to play external third party services to play less against cheaters.
still don't know how to control ak spread

You'll need to put a ton of hours into this game. It's fun and requires a ton of practice, if you wanna keep up with the professional. I ran into a lot of hackers during my period. They ruin the game for me but hopefully for you its different.
p90 rush banana trust you win every time, ct or t side ez dubs, throw flashes for blinding effect on the enemy to make fight easier for you
A nice game i will say:)
Cheaters see through the roof and the walls. It can't be a good game this way.

Комьюнити игры оставляет желать лучшего, ведь в этой игре обитает множество токсичных и подобных им людей, но где их нет в наше прекрасное время. В целом игра хороша, к тому же игры из серии Counter-Strike - это классика для любителей постреляться, так сказать "это база". Бывают и моменты, с которых пятая точка нашего тела горит, но ведь тем и слаще победы, и интереснее сама игра.
говно тупое бдите готовы получить вак просто так
nice game u need to play!!

Frustrating, rage inducing, and makes you want to throw your keyboard. In all a good game you will be addicted to and hate but keep playing to feed your addiction.
meilleur jeu du monde, on pourra toujours progresser et on ne s'ennuie jamais. Je recontre que très rarement des tricheurs grâce à l'anticheat amélioré de valve!!!
Its very good game I recommend it but the thing is you have to buy it to play without cheaters :( thats kinda sad that you need to spend money to play without them
